getRectUnderMouse

private Rectangle_Weighted getRectUnderMouse()
Gets the Rectangle underneath the mouse. Iterates through the array of weightedIsoforms and checks to see if the mouse is over it. If so, it returns the rectangle.

Returns:
a Rectangle_Weighted that is underneath the mouse coordinates. If there is none, return is null
